h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Apramana Bat
content: Once defeated, you'll gain a journal entry, experience, and some materials for your victory, but the Apramana Bat itself will retreat, and fly off into the distance. This won't be the last you see of it...
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Apramana Bat'.
The content is as follows:
Once defeated, you'll gain a journal entry, experience, and some materials for your victory, but the Apramana Bat itself will retreat, and fly off into the distance. This won't be the last you see of it...
